narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the president
Facility meets the minimum requirement for a class C exhibitor.
In addition the following items were discussed record keeping, vet care, itinerary, hours of inspection, and renewal
applications, and had applicant updated for e mail notifications.
In order to complete the application process the applicant needs to forward  a check for the appropriate amount to 
USDA-APHIS-AC
